filesystem.description: Efficient file system access to project, Zephyr source (read-only reference), and build output. Reduces token usage by using native file operations.

sequential-thinking.description: Structured thinking for complex embedded systems problems: clock configuration, DTS design, peripheral setup, and debugging.

memory.description: Persistent memory across sessions. Stores hardware pin mappings, peripheral configurations, build settings, and troubleshooting solutions.

puppeteer.description: Web automation and PDF reading. Fetches STM32H723 datasheets, reference manuals, Zephyr documentation, and peripheral app notes.

fetch.description: HTTP fetch for web content. Retrieves Zephyr docs, STM32 reference manuals, and technical documentation.
